panels.description: The amount of energy put into the batteries from the solar panels today. This value is reset when the Rover starts charging in the morning.
panels.title: Daily kWh

panels.description: The amount of energy supplied by the Rover's load terminals today. This resets in the morning.
panels.title: Daily kWh Consumption

list.description: The fragment ID of the SolarThing instance that is monitoring a Renogy Rover (or Rover-like device)
list.label: Fragment ID
list.name: fragmentId

list.description: The internal representation of the device's identifier. This can usually be left alone.
list.label: Identifier
list.name: identifier
